website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a natural mascara, this one is worth considering. But keep in mind that it's not ideal for lengthening or thickening short, sparse lashes.
pros: Stands out from other mascaras for being made of natural ingredients and not containing artificial or harsh chemicals or fragrance
cons: Color isn't very bold or buildable
Doesn't wear well in humid weather

customer_reviews.title: Works great for sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have used this formula for awhile now so I was excited to see it for a great price. I see others saying it was dried out or didn't work but my tube came as I expected. It works great and doesn't cause me the issues other brands do for my eyes. I will keep using this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Parentsof5

customer_reviews.title: Coverage
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I ordered the wrong one. Maybe this one was empty? I got barely any on the applicator and had to resort to my old mascara just to see my lashes. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Jo's heart-n-soul

customer_reviews.title: Drying, flaky
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to switch to cruelty free beauty products and came across this. I have sensitive eyes and this mascara seemed like it would be non irritating. But it gets very flaky and little specs of product would fall under my eye and in the outer corners of my eyes. This would make my eye area itchy and dry (besides looking a mess!). It’s also not great coverage. It didn’t do much to bring out my eyelashes. Had to use multiple coats if you want to see a noticeable difference. Too much hassle for small results.
customer_reviews.author: Char K

customer_reviews.title: Not great!
customer_reviews.text: Super excited about this product but unfortunately it didn’t even look like I had mascara on. I let it dry and tried multiple layers and it still didn’t show. Bummer. 10 mins later, I hadn’t even touched my eyes and it was running down my lower eye lids. 👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: L. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mascara. It stays on great during the day without flaking. The only small complaint I have is that for me I have to do a couple of layers on the lashes to get good coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not itchy and works well!
customer_reviews.text: I have a severe allergy to makeup and found this while looking for hypoallergenic mascara. It doesn’t clump and added a little length, but not much. Most mascara make my eyes itchy after a few hours but this didn’t unless I forgot to take it off at night. Definitely worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Archela

customer_reviews.title: Mascara arrived dried up
customer_reviews.text: The madcara came with all the product dried up. I couldn’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: LWlovesmyMan

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I have been using it now for a few weeks and feel as I can say the mascara works beautifully. Just keep in mind that it is organic and it isn’t waterproof. I live in Florida and when I sweat the mascara does run a little bit. But mostly looks smudged under the eye. Other than that. It works great. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Friedlieb

customer_reviews.title: Long gorgeous lashes — NO HEADACHE.
customer_reviews.text: Mascara gives me a headache and this is the only one that doesn't! And, it looks fabulous as well. Its only drawback is it needs to be replaced often as it dries up monthly.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not allergic to this mascara - used it for years?
customer_reviews.text: I’m allergic to foods, scents and makeup. This is the exception! What a relief! Don’t think it’s touted as waterproof. . . I use Alba cream face cleaner and rub it right on my wet eye lids and the mascara wipes and rinses of nicely. Have been using this mascara for years! I like brown as black is Really black. Alba Products work consistently with me.
customer_reviews.author: 9blossoms

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Allergies!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have major allergies, and this does help with my eyes watering! Has started to get dryer much quicker then other ones I have used, but worth it since it helps me not cry all of my makeup off!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Pattavina

customer_reviews.title: Washes off easily
customer_reviews.text: It may not make your lashes huge or really last the whole day, but I like how easily it washes off. I find a lot of the drug store brands like Cover Girl etc. are so hard to wash off without pulling out all your eyelashes.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Incredible for sensitive skin and eyes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited about this product! I haven't been able to wear mascara for years without suffering from terrible sinus headaches and swollen and itchy eyes. Often times I will get a migraine within an hour of applying regular mascara. This is the first one I've used with little to no issues. I even slept with it on and woke up feeling fine. If you have senstive skin, eyes and allergies this product is the best!!!! I suspect the people who having given this product bad reveiws don't suffer from makeup allergies. I can finally wear mascara again! Thank you for this product!
customer_reviews.author: morgan

customer_reviews.title: SUPER dry and flaky
customer_reviews.text: This USED to be my favorite mascara. My daughter and I both loved it. However, the last few times I've purchased it, it has been flaky and DRY. I bought two off Amazon, and straight out of the package, they are so dry, the mascara doesn't even go on my lashes. I will be finding a different mascara, since this new formula seems to be so dry.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa M

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price for this product! Subscribe and save!
customer_reviews.text: Good for an organic mascara. It’s more lengthening than volume, rather natural looking. I usually buy this at the store but have now subscribed here because the price is amazing. Trustworthy brand name mascara at a ridiculously low price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Only brand of mascara that doesn't irritate my eyes
customer_reviews.text: After trying many brands of mascara, both cheap and expensive, this is the only mascara that doesn't irritate my eyes. It has to be this specific one - even other physicians formula mascaras bother me. It was so nice being able to order it online and have it delivered to the house!
customer_reviews.author: WJ Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to feel nice
customer_reviews.text: Still evaluating this product. I think I like it but am used to a waterproof waxy mascara. This stuff feels so silky I want to be sure it is really on. I have short sparce lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent volume
customer_reviews.text: I was going for natural ingredients over volume and length, but I was happily surprised that this mascara does offer some of the latter.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a natural mascara that wasn't overpriced. The description sounded good, so I thought I would try it. Well, I never got the chance. When it arrived, it was nicely packaged but that was all. I opened it, and there was no mascara on the wand. So I swirled it around, pulled the wand out, still nothing. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Threekittylover

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found this....
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara! I am passionate out clean living and willing to pay for quality. In the interest of saving my pocket the damage of expensive direct marketing products, I picked this up to try out. Wow! I love it. Wears well and the wand was easy to use. No clumping or smudging.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I opened this up and there was no mascara,it was all dried up.
customer_reviews.author: luna66moon

customer_reviews.title: Improved my eyelid dermatitis
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara! I was having dermatitis type issues around my eyes with other mascaras. Once I switched to organic the dryness went away immediately. Very easy to remove with warm water .. no need for makeup remover. I am a fan of this mascara!!
customer_reviews.author: Chaotix

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Is not like normal mascara and that’s good for me. It’s toxin free!
customer_reviews.text: Goes on thin and wears off easier than typical mascara. I’m 100% fine with that though because it doesn’t irritate my eyes at all. Look fine and is easy to wash off. If you want dramatic lashes use something else. If you want a healthy alternative for normal wear... buy this.
customer_reviews.author: sarah zavoral

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Used a lot of Mascaras, including the pricey ones and this is by far my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive eyes and nourishing lashes
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive eyes and other mascaras irritate my eyes and make my already brittle lashes hard. This mascara actually nourishes lashes, keeps them soft, and is easy to remove with makeup wipes. It’s all I wear now.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa R

customer_reviews.title: Racoon Eyes
customer_reviews.text: Very flaky and not worth it. I find myself wiping my under eye frequently and feel like a raccoon. I love physicians formula but not this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara! I have been looking for one that has a more natural, not clumpy, look and doesn’t dry out my lashes. This is the one. It doesn’t make my lashes dry and brittle. No irritation with my contacts and it comes over easily
customer_reviews.author: shamella poole

customer_reviews.title: Super Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect customer service reps. Hard to come by quality experiences in this field for me so I MUCH appreciate it. Arrived fast. I'm loving the design of the bottle. Wouldn't get product. Ruined lashes for a bit. Weird white film even after removing.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Lash building color without any irritation to eyes
customer_reviews.text: A great lash covering formula without irritation for those who wear contacts. This was rated number 1 as the gentlest mascara with great coverage. Washes off easily too.
customer_reviews.author: Terri H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it except the smudging
customer_reviews.text: Love how this is an organic option, however, the product seems to smudge after wearing for a bit. Not a big deal—just something to consider if you aren’t near a mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Laur

customer_reviews.title: Clean ingredients, good performance.
customer_reviews.text: You won't get the type of results you do with some other mascaras, but my first priority is clean ingredients. This is a great mascara without the chemicals. It's wonderful for every day.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Barr

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work great for me
customer_reviews.text: Still looking for a good organic volumizing mascara that is waterproof enough. I didn’t mind this mascara, but by mid day it seemed to be wearing off for me.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott1282

customer_reviews.title: Super Clumpy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this mascara before, but I feel like it is much clumpier now. I used it because I have sensitive eyes and I want to use something cruelty free, but it is so clumpy that you can’t get it to go on and look good (even after clean the brush off multiple times).
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This mascara goes on pretty well, does not crumble (not always true of mascara), and most importantly for me -- I'm not allergic to it, and it does not aggravate dry eye.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen F

customer_reviews.title: Great organic mascara at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Stays on, no clumping. Organic. It’s a good product. I’ve used it for years.
customer_reviews.author: gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Adds great length
customer_reviews.text: I love how it adds great length. I hate though that after wearing for a short period of time, my bottom lashes wind up with mascara smeared all under my eyes. Price is good though!
customer_reviews.author: Horse Lover

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mascara for 4 months now & it's still working great. Has not dried up, does not clump, gives good coverage. It is definitely worth the price for me. I will be ordering more soon.
customer_reviews.author: pamela madril

customer_reviews.title: One time purchase
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the application as it was watery and had no volume. Preferring a waterproof mascara this was not to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Middle Sister

customer_reviews.title: I like because it's natural
customer_reviews.text: I like any product that is natural and better for our bodies. I use this for many years. It is 'not' water resistance though.
customer_reviews.author: GlanzTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: No no BIG no
customer_reviews.text: Horrible actually gave me a stye in my eye!! I never got a stye I didn’t even know what it was in my 35 years of life is to using this I got a stye I was freaking out!! I thought my eye was going to stay puffy and Distorted
customer_reviews.author: Bryn

customer_reviews.title: Great Masacara
customer_reviews.text: Does not irritate my eyes, easy to use, and comes off easily with soap and water )or makeup remover). Also, works well for volume and color.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't flake and bother my eyes like other brands. I love it because they don't test their products on animals.
customer_reviews.author: m buehner

customer_reviews.title: Mascara appears dry or old
customer_reviews.text: Dry. Container feels empty. Seems like product was really old. Not pleased with this. Physicians Formula products seem to be loosing quality control in the last few years.
customer_reviews.author: MrMojoRisin2438

customer_reviews.title: This is a Beautiful, Recommended, and Well-Crafted Physicians Formula Mascara
customer_reviews.text: I liked the pretty, nature-inspired design of the mascara. I used this mascara as a part of beauty treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I keep reordering this one
customer_reviews.text: It's my fave mascara now. Great value for a quality mascara. I like that it doesn't smudge and easy to remove, I like to use coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: Natalya

customer_reviews.title: Cruelty free--To animals and my lashes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was organic and cruelty free, but I love how great it makes my lashes look. I was surprised by how thick they look without feeling weighed down. It's also not harsh on my lashes or hard to remove. Even more expensive brands I used in the past were too much and made them fall out, esp when I took it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t burn my eyes. I am usually allergic to eye make-up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a more natural alternative
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for my mom a few years ago. She does not wear a lot of makeup, but she used all of it and asked for more. It's not the perfect product, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Lashes stay soft.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a few years. My absolute favorite. No clumping. Non irritating.
customer_reviews.author: yogibear

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Great high-quality product. Glad I bought it. Look wonderful when applied. Comfortable to wear. Will definitely order again. Super fast shipping too! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: mari

customer_reviews.title: This really makes your lashes look longer & separates them very well w/ no clumping!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I was surprised how it separates the lashes and leaves no clumping. It also doesn’t smear or run as easily as some non-waterproof mascaras I have used. I love that it’s natural & organic so I’m Not putting toxins in my body. That was originally why I bought it! I will Definitely but this again & continue using it indefinely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: came dried out
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this from a actual store in the past. My order was already drying out when I opened it. I only expect to be able to use it a few times. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Schutte

customer_reviews.title: HYPO ALLERGENIC WORTH BUYING
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply. Thick on lashes; especially, for hypo-allergenic. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Krogstad

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Well, it’s organic but it didn’t do a lot for my lashes, no length or volume , just color. This is not the mascara for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Hibbs

customer_reviews.title: Love product and ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara. I have to do a few coats to get my lashes thick enough but the quality of ingredients is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Into the trash it went
customer_reviews.text: The mascara smelled and didn’t apply well, even with layers and layers it only looked like one wimpy layer. This also smudged horrible and I had raccoon eyes in an hour. Into the trash...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stung my eyes
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this mascara because the case is pretty and looks eco friendly I liked it when it first went on but my eyes started watering and the mascara was painfully stinging my eyes. My daughters also. I have to order new mascara now because I cant deal with how this mascara made my eyes sting
customer_reviews.author: Earthie Mama

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive maybe, also empty.
customer_reviews.text: I put this on for the first time and hardly anything came out. It was like the thing was empty. What did come out was not great at all. No length what so ever. Best to stick to Clinique.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Been using for several years. Inexpensive for an organic mascara. I like the fact that it lasts all day and I can wash it off with soap and water
customer_reviews.author: Gloria A

customer_reviews.title: Organic mascara
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after reading several reviews of organic mascara. I do not like this products. Smears and leaves lashes feeling dry.
customer_reviews.author: CDBoston

customer_reviews.title: not crazy about the wand
customer_reviews.text: I think this mascara is fine but the wand is not my favorite. it's not really a brush - more like rubbery/plastic bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Staples

customer_reviews.title: Great wand
customer_reviews.text: Smudges with my oily skin, but other wise it's I love the wand and thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beauty is pain
customer_reviews.text: It's a great mascara for those who believe beauty is pain. It doesn't go on easily but after multiple applications, it does eventually make long full lashes. Just NEVER do anything that makes your eyes water because it will burn the crap out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great if you are going for a raccoon look...
customer_reviews.text: Runs after a couple hours of wear causing black circles under the eyes; disappointing
customer_reviews.author: amy pennington

customer_reviews.title: Organic
customer_reviews.text: Organic but takes a while to dry on your lashes so can smudge
customer_reviews.author: Traci H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara - applies easily without clumps. Organic, animal cruelty free.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby O.

customer_reviews.title: Dried up ---  twice
customer_reviews.text: 1. Searching for an organic product(rare) 2. Ordering it 3. It was dried up when it arrived. 4. Calling the customer care, returning it, getting the replacement 5. Dried up the second time......... 6. Writing this review ---WASTE OF TIME----
customer_reviews.author: chitra

customer_reviews.title: If the mascara runs
customer_reviews.text: Looking for mascara that doesn’t bleed or leak on my face below my Lower lash. Did one did imprint:-/ It did not cause eye pressure or head aches so that was great! But less than many!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Philpott

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Dose not burn my eyes when I apply it like other commercial products, I really like it and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, no irritation, and unless your face gets wet (e.g. sweat, tears, etc), it doesn't run. I haven't had any issues with clumping or uneven application.
customer_reviews.author: K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: I have been buying this for years.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mascara: organic and at a great price. Goes on well and stay on the entire day.
customer_reviews.author: Simonbaby

customer_reviews.title: Flakes off onto skin below eyes
customer_reviews.text: I typically love this brand but this mascara doesn't work on my lashes - at all. Easy to take off is right, without any make up remover as it flakes off slowly throughout the day onto the skin below my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore I. Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: Notice
customer_reviews.text: This mascara as running down my lower eyelids after I applied it which made an irritation under my eyes please do yourself a favor don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Notice Y’all

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been having problems with dry, irritated eyes, and switching to this mascara has definitely helped.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Murphy

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and it’s  not harmful for your body.
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find something natural that looks good in my eyelashes for so long and I finally found this product which looks amazing and the best part is that it has no chemicals! Nothing better than that :) thank you for making it!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for value
customer_reviews.text: My eyelashes are coming off after using this mascara even though ingredient list looks clean. Wearing the mascara feels clunky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of the applicator handle. It is slightly larger and textured which makes it easy to hold and maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: dewillia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to remove !
customer_reviews.text: Comes of pretty easy so make sure to see if its running every once and a while but overall for a natural mascara it's great and if noticed my eyes are much less irritated after using this vs regular mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Harkamal

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It doesn’t clump and last for a while. And it’s cruelty free
customer_reviews.author: C. Watts

customer_reviews.title: Orgainc but easily smudges
customer_reviews.text: Good organic mascara only problem is it flakes off easily at night or with rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Shanietria Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara, wears all day but comes off easily with make up remover,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe product with no toxins
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and love that it’s all non toxic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you like toy mascara.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t even do anything. I use it to scratch my eyes when they become itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesnt stay on
customer_reviews.text: Yes its a better product but after 10 minutes i look like a racoon.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof or Smudgeproof
customer_reviews.text: Searched for waterproof and this brand showed up It is anything but waterproof, it constantly smudges and does not enhance eyelashes at all.
customer_reviews.author: P. GREENAN

customer_reviews.title: A little too powdery for me.
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite organic mascara. Tends to be powdery & smears easily
customer_reviews.author: April Treona Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof at all
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I’m giving it a 4 star is because it comes off too easy. It’s definitely not the least bit waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Q

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I won’t buy it again but I do love the fact it’s organic it just didn’t make the impact I needed I think it’s because of the brush quality.
customer_reviews.author: Zelia Milan

customer_reviews.title: Finally! No scratchy, itching eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many, many "allergy free" mascaras which never worked. Finally Physicians Formula is one that truly works.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Won’t dry
customer_reviews.text: It stays sticky feeling like it won’t dry and continuously gets around my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff..
customer_reviews.text: Gives your lashes a thick, long and natural look. It also comes off very very easily
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara! Makes my eyelashes look great! This is the only mascara I can wear without my eyelids swelling up the next day!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't give volume
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend says this mascara bottle feels empty when she first tried to use it and doesn't apply much on your lashes. It doesn't really give you volume or much length. I won't be buying this for her again.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Eaton

customer_reviews.title: great mascara
customer_reviews.text: got this for a Christmas gift last year and loved it so went to CVS to get another one but Amazon has a better price.
customer_reviews.author: vicki Walters

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok but it runs
customer_reviews.text: It smudges and runs very easily. It isn’t the easiest to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara. I have sensitive eyes and have never had a problem with physicians formula.
customer_reviews.author: kathi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Product did not stay on my eyelashes. By mid day I had raccoon looking eyes.
customer_reviews.author: SessyJ

customer_reviews.title: irritated my eyes
customer_reviews.text: I like how it goes on but it irritated my eyes. They were itchy all day. I tried it several times and every time I tried it my eyes would go crazy... and my eyes aren't usually sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good initial results but not very smuge proof to be honest....
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Russell

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof!
customer_reviews.text: The mascara starts running even if it is slightly humid outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: ailina

product_meta.title: Physicians Formula Black Organic Wear 100% Natural Origin Mascara, 0.26 Ounce
feature_bullets: NO NEED FOR FALSE EYELASHES with this bold mascara, which provides 5x Lash Boosting for lash length, volume & definition naturally. Recyclable Eco-Brush spoolie coats and defines each lash with ultra-soft plastic bristles.

NATURAL MASCARA ORIGINS: Made with 70% of total ingredients from organic farming, this Natural Origin mascara is free of harsh chemicals, parabens, and synthetic preservatives, and doesn't smudge, clump, or flake. Hypoallergenic, fragrance-free.

DRAW EYES: From our Shimmer Strips Collection of eye enhancing eyeshadow pallets and eyeliners, to our Eye Booster mascaras and 2-in-1 eyeliner and eyelash serums, to our brow gels and eye primers, Physician's Formula has what you need to draw eyes.

Physician's Formula offers a full line of skin care and makeup for sensitive skin, including mascaras, lipsticks, concealers, eyeliners, eyeshadow palettes, bb creams, bronzers & primers. Our products are hypoallergenic & safe for sensitive skin and eyes.
HEALTHY BEAUTY PRODUCTS: Every one of our products is hypoallergenic, safe for sensitive skin & eyes, & created without any of the 150+ known harsh ingredients found in other personal care items.
